Articles.Content: I\'ve been playing the demo for days and so I forced my self to pre-order the game and get the latest version. My wife is going to hate me now. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Well then, i hope you enjoy the game! Allons-y!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

> 
> Welcome to the KSP Forums!
> 
> Happy Launching!
> 
> Arrr!
> 
> Capt\'n Skunky
> 
> KSP Community Manager

More like Happy Booming! 

Finally achieved lift off and entered space. The next step: Achieve orbit.

All you need to do is tilt your ship once you\'re at 100k meters and keep boosting at that direction.

Please give me the Sonic Screwdriver.

**Hedgehogs and Powertools!**

**-Arcane**
Welcome! I\'m glad the demo roped you in, happy launches!
